string-array.name: about
string-array.item: Foodbook helps people to find restaurants/bar/cafe in near locations and review user rating and comments. Application by default displays near by location restaurants and capable to search any specific places. Also helps people navigate to the location using google map.

string-array.name: features
string-array.item:
♦ Display near location food 
 ♦ Search places 
 ♦ Read user reviews 
 ♦ Write reviews using Google+ account 
 ♦ Navigate to the location 
 ♦ Share details trough social and email apps. 
 ♦ Mark Favorite food place 
 ♦ View location map 
 ♦ Change search radius

string-array.name: permissions
string-array.item:
♦ Access device location to identity the current location 
 ♦ Network to retrieve date from Google Place Service 
 ♦ Access device storage to mark favorites 
 ♦ Google Map to navigate to location

string-array.name: limits
string-array.item:
♦ App will work only if device location is enabled and agreed 
 ♦ App will search only on specified radius provided in settings 
 ♦ Writing review can only be using Google+ account 
 ♦ Displays reviews only from Google users
